alert.note: Alert for Bowie; Red River (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 5:52PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Little River, southeastern McCurtain, western Bowie and east central Red River Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 552 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northwest of De Kalb, or 16 miles northeast of Boxelder, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Boston, Foreman, De Kalb, Arkinda, Avery, Haworth, Bokhoma, Almont, Moon, Beaverdams, Goodlake, Wallace, Tom, Arden and America. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
